content: Dr Yoshi Gotoh | Computer Science | The University of Sheffield Skip to main content Search sheffield.ac.uk Close menu × School of Computer Science School of Computer Science Menu Dr Yoshi Gotoh PhD School of Computer Science Lecturer Student Projects Officer Member of the Speech and Hearing (SpandH) research group Open staff member portrait in a modal window y.gotoh@sheffield.ac.uk Regent Court (DCS) Full contact details Dr Yoshi Gotoh School of Computer Science Regent Court (DCS) 211 Portobello Sheffield S1 4DP Google Scholar Personal website Profile Yoshi is a lecturer in the Department of Computer Science. He has a first degree in Engineering form the University of Tokyo and a PhD from Brown University. Research interests Yoshi has been working in the field of speech and spoken language processing for years. His current interests include audio visual processing, in particular, video analysis and video information retrieval.
